H0.text: What gladiator famously led a slave revolt against Rome. Crixus

H1.text: What gladiator famously led a slave revolt against Rome. Eunus

H2.text: What gladiator famously led a slave revolt against Rome. Castus

H3.text: What gladiator famously led a slave revolt against Rome. Spartacus

A4.text: His revolt began in 73 BC when, along with about 70 other gladiators, he escaped a gladiatorial school near Capua.

A5.text: The two legions were initially successful—defeating a group of 30,000 rebels commanded by Crixus near Mount Garganus—

A6.text: By the end of 73 BC, Spartacus and Crixus were in command of a large group of armed men with a proven ability to withstand Roman armies.
